Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.saving

Class PlayerData

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.saving.PlayerData
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientPlayerData
public class PlayerData extends Object implements Serializable
PlayerDAta allows to store and share information regarding a Player, including secret data.

      public PlayerData(String nickname, PlayerColor playerColor, Map<CardLocation,CardSlot> board, PlayCard[] playerCards, Goal privateGoal, ItemCollection inventory, StartCard startCard, Goal[] availableGoals)
      Builds a PlayerData object that represents a player whose data is provided
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player's nickname
      playerColor - the player's color
      board - the player's board
      playerCards - the player's hand
      privateGoal - the player's private goal
      inventory - the player's inventory
      startCard - the player's starting card
      availableGoals - the player's available private goals
